author: donschoe
content: I'm syncing a Teku node on Schlesi right now.

author: protolambda
content: Might be related to recent pr 1707 (fork-choice race condition) <@557201004060213248>

author: ajsutton
content: <@!557201004060213248> Yep, I saw that one yesterday and it seems to be quite new.  I'll investigate early next week.  Teku is also printing a *ton* of errors from the networking layer, mostly because jvm-libp2p is treating any protocol violation from a peer as an error, some because disconnected peers aren't being handled quite right at various layers yet.  Now that we've got basic v0.11.1 networking compatibility I'm going to focus on hunting down all those errors to try and make things more sane.

author: ajsutton
content: Both forkchoice and networking have undergone massive changes recently (and still not quite done) so not particularly surprised there are some teething issues.
